title: A dialogue betweene Master Guesright and poore neighbour Needy. Or A few proofes both reall and true, shewing what men for mony will doe. To a pleasant new tune, called, But I know what I know.
author: E. F. (Edward Ford), fl. 1630?-1660.
notes: Verse: "VVell met neighbour Needy, what walking alone ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
